Name: Winter Clove
Ingredients: 5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist with a flamed clove.
Review: Zesty mandarin orange and cognac with a hint of smoky peat and clove spice.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Eric Tinca at Love die Late, Great Portland Street, London, England.
